Please, check the written data is correct.

trainingdescription.title: How is the Training going
trainingdescription.mentoring-text: Here, as part of our development team, students work closely with experienced engineers to quickly deepen their skills through real-world work in coding, development, design, and testing. A great advantage of the internship is an the ability to immerse yourself in teamwork. the internship will be supervised by an experienced mentor who will be able to help with the implementation of the project, as well as contribute to the accumulation of new knowledge.
trainingdescription.aboutwork: After compliting the internship students could have the opportunity to get the job offer. Advantages of working in EXADEL:
trainingdescription.ourconditions: Our offices are quite comfortable, and also you will be able to work remotely
trainingdescription.world: Our offices are located in all over the world
trainingdescription.goods: Coffee, cookies and relaxation area are all for you
trainingdescription.toget: To get an internship you should:
trainingdescription.resume: Send your SV by the form on the website
trainingdescription.reqinterview: Take a phone interview with a recruiter
trainingdescription.tech: Take an interview with our technician specialist
trainingdescription.learn: Start learning according to  to the chosen program
